channel.title: Internet on Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Internet on Docs

item.title: I recently had the pleasure of hosting two surrogate Beagles and tell you what I know about Beagles!
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: As people’s standard of living is getting better and better, the number of families with pet dogs is increasing, and lately I’ve been seeing postings/questions from people asking about Beagles. It just so happens that recently I have received two surrogate training Beagles here, and I’ll state in advance that I have no previous experience with breeding or training Beagles, and this is my first experience with them, so today I’m going to talk about what I know about Beagles!
